name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a vibrant orange box and classic buttons. Its arms and legs are sturdy and made from foundry materials, ensuring durability and stability. The screen on its front displays a mesmerizing snake game, adding a touch of entertainment to its functionality. To protect its advanced circuitry, Volt is equipped with a sleek helmet addon. As a member of the WebtrES club, Volt brings its unique set of abilities and skills to the digital realm.
